mapper.sql: id, a_key, name, value, flow_id, node_id, version, ts
mapper.delete: delete from flow_node_attr where flow_id = #{flowId} and node_id=#{nodeId}
mapper.insert: insert into flow_node_attr (id, a_key, name, value, flow_id, node_id, version, ts) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flowId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nodeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 0, now())

insert into flow_node_attr (id, a_key, name, value, flow_id, node_id, version, ts)
(#{it.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{it.key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{it.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{it.value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{it.flowId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{it.nodeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 0, now())

insert into flow_node_attr
id, a_key, name, value, flow_id, node_id, version, ts,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flowId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nodeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 0, now(),
mapper.update: update flow_node_attr set a_key = #{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value = #{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flow_id = #{flowId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, node_id = #{nodeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version = version+1, ts = now() where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.delete: delete from flow_node_attr where id in #{it}
